name: Los Salmones Apartments

reviews.title: best ever
reviews.text: Los salmones is the best place we have ever stayed at. Perfect location for beach, clubs and shopping. The pool and bar are great and we met a great bunch of people but this wasn't pressed on us if we didn't want to mix.

likes.disliked: — Checking out policy e.g have to check out early even if late night flight

reviews.text: Stayed here in Sep 2006 with 2 friends. The holiday started off on a bad note as first of all the private taxi transfer we had paid for was in fact not private at all. We had to share a minibus with about 8 others even though we had paid extra for our own 4 seater taxi. Anyway got to the hotel and were a bit taken aback by the presentation of the hotel. Found out that they did not have us down as all inclusive. Then found out that even though we had specified a triple room we were given a twin room with not enough space for a 3rd fold-up bed. So one of us ended up sleeping on the sofa for 1 week. Next day called the travel agent in England to complain which fell on deaf ears. Anyway the all inclusive was sorted out so we just decided to make the most of it. Once we got over the initial shock we had a great time. Staff were very friendly and chatty. Beach is only about 5-10 mins walk and easy to find good spot. Shops & nightlife same distance. We were 3 girls and did not feel afraid to walk back to hotel at 3-4 in the morning, very safe. China white is a good club to go and you get free entry and buy one get one free drink - which you get in most bars/clubs. Beware though if you have a late night flight as they won't give you the room for few extra hours even though we offered to pay. We had to check out by 12 and our pick up was not until 11.30pm!! Even after all that we didn't want to come home by the end. Great for young people just out for sun bathing and fun.
reviews.title: We had an excellent time !!
Not bad for what we paid
reviews.text: Having read some of the previous reviews, we knew this was going to be a fairly noisey hotel. It wasnt as bad as we thought it was going to be! I was only kept awake one night whcih was fairly good i thought!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was ok, but im a vegeterian, so i pretty much had chips and salad the whole time.
reviews.title: Stop moaning, your on holiday!!!
Stay here if you wanna stay with cockroaches
reviews.text: The room was a bit tired, but clean. I didnt expect there to be airconditioning but there wasnt even a celling fan or desk fan! However there are shutters at the windows so you can have the breeze without the sun glare.
All the staff were very kind and friendly.
reviews.title: you get what you pay for

reviews.text: The Irish center is like 2mins away, Kasbar about 8, and yumbo about 15.
reviews.title: The best holiday ever!!! Dinlo!...

likes.disliked: — Restaurant food didn't smell to good!

reviews.text: Just returned from a week at Los Salmones (8th-15th) and I would definately return.
reviews.title: I would definately return

likes.liked: — Going all inclusive, and the room being cleaned every day

reviews.text: You don't pay a lot of money so don't go expecting 5 star luxury, but it was certainly enough for us. The apartments were clean (the bathroom was a little bit dated and had a few cracks though) and the staff were friendly.
reviews.title: Spainish Butlins

reviews.text: It's about a 5-10minute walk from the beach which is beautiful, and the apartments are close to the shops and bars. The food was nothing special at all but perfectly adequate - I seriously advise you to go All inclusive, not having to pay for food and drinks is amazing! It saves you literally hundreds of pounds over the time you spend there. It saved us about £250 each on food alone and that's not even thinking about the amount we would have spent on drinks behind the bar!
reviews.title: Complete Dump!!
Sleepless Nights
reviews.text: It really isn't that loud, so don't be put off by the hype. There is evening entertainment, and local bars and clubs which you can just about hear at night, but it really wasn't that bad!
I would return if I was going back to Playa Del Ingles.
reviews.title: Brill nightlife!

aka: Los Salmones Apartments Hotel Playa Del Ingles
